headline: Argentina Construction Equipment Market Research Report 2026-2031: Caterpillar, SANY, XCMG, John Deere, and Bobcat Lead, Komatsu, JCB, CNH, Hyundai, LOVOL and Volvo Challenge for Market Share
summary: The Argentina construction equipment market is set to grow from 9,240 units in 2025 to 12,141 units by 2031, at a CAGR of 4.66%. Material Handling equipment leads, especially Forklifts/Telescopic Handlers, due to increased import reliance. Earthmoving equipment demand, driven by real estate recovery and mining expansion, is significant, particularly for lithium and copper extraction. The road construction sector, boosted by the Federal Concession Network and National Road Network Plan, is expect

headline: Mexico Construction Equipment Industry Report 2026-2031 - Caterpillar, LiuGong, Komatsu, Liebherr, Volvo CE, John Deere, XCMG are the Front-runners by Offering a Diverse Set of Equipment
summary: The Mexico construction equipment market, valued at 32,188 units in 2025, is projected to grow at a CAGR of 3.08%, reaching 38,612 units by 2031. Earthmoving equipment, led by excavators, holds the largest market share, driven by the expanding mining sector. Material handling equipment demand is rising due to nearshoring and e-commerce, notably Amazon’s $6 billion investment in distribution centers.
